item.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
item.description: GitHub Repository TL;DR Using Resampling (SMOTE) and Machine Learning to detect credit card fraud, using F1 as the key performance metric. Project Overview

item.title: Predicting UFC Fights
item.description: GitHub Repository | Presentation Slides | Blog Post TL;DR Predict the winner of a UFC fight, using machine learning, in order to place more calculated bets. Project Overview Machine Learning is increasingly being used throughout the sporting world. Previously knowledge was gained through “gut” instincts, but with improving technology and data analysis new insights are emerging all the time and often challenge previously held perceptions. Athletes and coaches are adopting analytics to gain an advantage, no matter how slight, in order to maximize performance.

item.title: A Study of Lynching Victims during the Lynching Era in US 1880-1930
item.description: GitHub Repository | Presentation Slides TL;DR Analysis of the terrible legacy of lynching in the United States, during the “lynching era” of 1880 to 1930. Project Overview

item.title: Time Series Forecasting
item.description: GitHub Repository | Presentation Slides TL;DR Using ARIMA model to Time Series forecast the house prices in Chicago in order to advise an investor. Project Overview The project seeks to discover the 5 best zipcodes to invest in, in the Chicago area. 5 potential definitions were used for “best” to cater for different styles of investors. Historic Chicago house price data was used to build an ARIMA time series model and predict where house prices would be at a future date.
